note.p: Conchologist and entomologist. Involved with the establishment of the Yorkshire Naturalists’ Union (1877), the Conchological Society, the Leeds Conchological Club, and the Leeds Naturalists’ Field Club. President, Yorkshire Naturalists’ Union, 1903. Editor of the Naturalist, the journal of the YNU, 1884–1902. Instituted ‘Fungus Forays’. Honorary MSc, University of Leeds, 1915. Fellow of the Linnean Society, 1884.
Proceedings of the Linnean Society of London 131 (1918–19): 64–5
